title: How to have multiple config files (region, language, ect) with one dumb batch file
body:
cd "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends"
start LeagueClient.exe
@echo off
mkdir AltConfig
rename Config MainConfig
rename AltConfig Config
timeout /t 4 /nobreak >nul
:loop
tasklist /FI "IMAGENAME eq LeagueClientUXRender.exe" 2>NUL | find /I /N "LeagueClientUXRender.exe">NUL
if "%ERRORLEVEL%"=="0" (
    timeout /t 10 /nobreak >nul
    goto :loop
)
rename Config AltConfig
rename MainConfig Config


I know not why, but i was bored.
